name: Brass Petal Flower blanks for stamping, 7/8"
description:
These are too cute and are ready for dapping, stamping, riveting, and patinas!  (Be sure to wash and dry them for a pristine finish.)


You'll get adorable 7/8" 24-gauge brass petal flowers.  Easy as pie to punch a hole in these with either a hand punch or a two-hole punch.


NEW!~~  Discount for multiple numbers available!  As cheap as .36 a piece!



****Note on shipping -- if you pay overage from what the actual shipping is (which can happen with International shipping) I will refund you a portion of the overage, minus packaging. ******


Come visit www.PrettyThingsBlog.com!

name: SALE eBook on Blogging Prompts
description:
If you've ever been stuck with what to write for your blog, look no further! 

The book has 59 pages, 65 photos (many from fellow jewelry designers), dozens upon dozens of blogging prompts
(and it's not jewelry-centric, so lots of ideas for every style of blogger!

View the other pages to see the photo prompts.

Sent via PDF, so no shipping for this one!

name: Pewter Bead Cap Set  (unique and decorative)
description:
This is a great set of bead caps for a variety of shapes of beads!

You get:

:: 16 shallow hobnail bead caps, 10x3 mm
:: 10 ornate bell caps, 18x10 mm
:: 20 shallow star flower caps, 10x2 mm


As with most of my beads, if you prefer a custom order of a particular style or amount, please let me know.


Metal is lead-free pewter.


From a non-smoking but wildly fun home.

****Note on shipping -- if you pay overage from what the actual shipping is (which can happen with International shipping) I will refund you a portion of the overage, minus packaging. ******

name: 78 Pewter Unique Decorative SOLDERED Rings
description:
This is a terrific must-have for your jewelry designs!  All rings are *soldered* and made of pewter.

You get:

:: (8) eight 38 mm x 20 mm large hammered oval rings

:: (20) twenty 13 mm plain rings

:: (30) thirty 9 mm twisted wire rings

:: (20) twenty 9mm flat rings with stamped dot accent


Lots of rings for connections, earrings, and dangles!

As with most of my beads, if you prefer a custom order of a particular style or amount, please let me know.


Metal is lead-free pewter.


From a non-smoking but wildly fun home.

name: Pewter Clasp and Toggle Set -- gold and silver #1
description:
You can NEVER have too many clasps. With sterling so expensive, I searched for a long time to find just the right pewter and zinc alloy clasps just for you!  And you can can't beat 2.00 a clasp!


This Bead Soup mix is ALL CLASPS.  You get:

::  a 20mm Tierracast copper clock toggle
::  a 20mm decorative silver oxidized pewter Tierracast toggle,
::  a 30mm adorned gold-toned pewter lobster claw
::  a 20mm floral toggle clasp in oxidized pewter
::  a 25mm flat patterned toggle 

All clasps are patterned on both sides.

Personally tested and approved! :-)

As with most of my beads, if you prefer a custom order of a particular style or amount, please let me know.


Metal is lead-free pewter.


From a non-smoking but wildly fun home.

****Note on shipping -- if you pay overage from what the actual shipping is (which can happen with International shipping) I will refund you a portion of the overage, minus packaging. ******


Come visit www.PrettyThingsBlog.com!
